episodes.natural_language:
Initial client contact on May 27, 2025, with Prince Ngabonziza regarding a motor vehicle accident. The client, Prince Ngabonziza, is listed with phone number 502-705-2996. Address on file is Louisville, Kentucky (street address redacted). Date of birth on file is redacted, and Social Security Number on file is redacted.

Date of accident: May 27, 2025. The incident occurred in Kokomo, Indiana, at 2970 W. State Road, with Kokomo Police Department handling the scene. The client was a passenger in a rental Chevy Trax driven by Rafiki Nsanzabandi. They were coming from Michigan, and at approximately 1:00 a.m. they rear-ended another vehicle at a red light. The rental was insured through Enterprise Insurance. The client was transported to St. Elizabeth Hospital South by Taylor Boulevard, with injuries to the neck and to the right side of the back.

On June 2, 2025, Justin made contact regarding the case.
episodes.author: Filevine Integration

It's Justin from the Whaley Law Firm. We just spoke. This is the text only number for your file. Please send the rental information here along with any photos you have of your injuries and vehicle damage. Feel free to call me anytime at 502-583-4022
episodes.natural_language:
Case: Prince-Ngabonziza-MVA-5-27-2025. On May 27, 2025, initial client contact was made with Prince Ngabonziza regarding a motor vehicle accident.

Justin from the Whaley Law Firm spoke with Prince and noted that this is the text-only number for the file. He asked Prince to send the rental information to this number, along with any photos he has of his injuries and of the vehicle damage. He also provided his contact number, 502-583-4022, and invited Prince to call anytime.
episodes.author: Justin Chumbley

episodes.original_body:
Case: Prince-Ngabonziza-MVA-5-27-2025
Client: Prince Ngabonziza

Completed case overview update task. Updated comprehensive case summary and current status with detailed accident information, injuries, treatment providers, insurance details, and next action items needed. Case summary now includes: accident details (5/27/2025 rear-end collision in Kokomo, IN), client info, injuries (neck/back), medical providers (St. Elizabeth South ER, Starlite Chiropractic), insurance (Elco Insurance - pending adjuster assignment), and documents (intake forms, rental agreement, injury photos). Current status identifies next steps: obtain accident report, follow up with insurance, request medical records/bills, and note statute of limitations (5/27/2027).
episodes.natural_language:
Case Prince-Ngabonziza-MVA-5-27-2025 involves client Prince Ngabonziza. The case overview update has been completed, and the comprehensive case summary and current status have been revised to include detailed accident information, injuries, treatment providers, insurance details, and next action items.

The updated case summary records that on May 27, 2025, there was a rear-end collision in Kokomo, Indiana. The client sustained neck and back injuries. Medical care has been provided by St. Elizabeth South ER and Starlite Chiropractic. The claim is with Elco Insurance, with the adjuster assignment currently pending. Documents on file include intake forms, a rental agreement, and injury photos. The current status identifies the next steps as: obtain the accident report, follow up with the insurance, request medical records and bills, and note the statute of limitations as May 27, 2027.
episodes.author: Agent for Prince-Ngabonziza-MVA-5-27-2025
